description.en-us: The BIQU Panda Breath is a chamber heater and filter for Bambu Lab printers. It uses a 300W PTC heater to warm the chamber, which helps prevent warping, strengthens layer adhesion in engineering materials (ABS, ASA, PC, PA...), and improves first-layer adhesion for all filaments.
description.zh-cn: BIQU Panda Breath 是用于 Bambu Lab 打印机的腔体加热器和过滤器。它使用 300W PTC 加热器加热腔体，有助于防止翘曲，增强工程材料（ABS、ASA、PC、PA......）的层粘合力，并改善所有长丝的第一层粘合力。
